content:
ashley OConOctober  

Returning to the Hornets home field Sacramento State womens soccer team played the San Jose State Spartans resulting into its third tie of the season with a score of  PERIOD

Early in the first half junior Cori Shreve scored the first goal for the Hornets giving Sac State the  lead PERIOD

Shortly after Hornets had taken the lead San Joses Emmy Belding headed their first goal set up by a corner kick tying the game  PERIOD

Throughout the rest of the game and into double overtime Sac State had a lot of attempts at the goal but werent able to score.Coach Randy Dedini believed that the team had a lot of opportunities to score PERIOD

Well we only scored one goal and we had  shots PERIOD I thought we created some good enough chances to score but we just werent sticking them in the back of the net especially in the first half Dedini said PERIOD We had some really good opportunities that we just didnt put away PERIOD Thats been one of our problems all year we get chances but we havent been finishing PERIOD Its still something we have to work on. freshman midfielder Jessica Castano stated that the team still put out a good effort to score PERIOD

We definitely picked it up second half PERIOD The first half we didnt come out as strong as we should have Castao said PERIOD We got a lot of shots off so unfortunately we couldnt put it away PERIOD But usually our problem is not shooting at all PERIOD So at least were shooting. other players on the team said that working together kept them in the game PERIOD

We kind of had to figure out coming off of a win from Cal we knew that passing would be smart so we tried to do that junior forward Leah Lorat stated PERIOD

Sac State will host its next game this Friday at  p.m PERIOD against Northern Arizona in its first Big Sky Conference match of the season PERIOD

Ashley OCon can be reached at emailprotected

Your donation will support the student journalists of Sacramento State University PERIOD Your contribution will allow us to purchase equipment and cover our annual website hosting costs PERIOD

title: Women’s soccer ends weekend with draw against San Jose State 1-1 – The State Hornet
name: CSU Sacramento
